articles.title: U.S. tells diplomats' families to leave Ukraine, weighs troop options - Reuters
articles.description: The U.S. State Department announced Sunday it was ordering diplomats' family members to leave Ukraine, as U.S. President Joe Biden weighed options for boosting America's military assets in Eastern Europe to counter a buildup of Russian troops.

articles.title: U.S. draws down Ukraine embassy presence as fears of Russian invasion mount - CP24 Toronto's Breaking News
articles.description: The State Department on Sunday ordered the families of all American personnel at the U.S. Embassy in Ukraine to leave the country amid heightened fears of a Russian invasion.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON (AP) - The State Department on Sunday ordered the families of all American personnel at the U.S. Embassy in Ukraine to leave the country amid heightened fears of a Russian invasion.

articles.title: Canadian Scientist Goes Back in Time Using the World's Biggest Space Telescope - Optic Flux
